TvShow.Title: Burn Notice
TvShow.ShortDescription: Burn Notice stars Jeffrey Donovan as Michael Westen, a blacklisted spy who finds himself stranded in sun-soaked Miami.

TvShow.Title: Chrisley Knows Best
TvShow.ShortDescription: CHRISLEY KNOWS BEST, is a real-life family comedy which follows Atlanta-based self-made multimillionaire Todd Chrisley, his devoted wife Julie and their five children who live a seemingly picture-perfect Southern life with everything money can buy. A “patriarch of perfection,” Todd runs his family just like his business – with an iron fist – and micromanages every move and expenditure made by each member of the Chrisley clan. But behind the façade of the family’s fairy-tale like 30,000 square-foot home, real-life issues and lots of laugh-out-loud drama unfolds.

TvShow.Title: Colony
TvShow.ShortDescription: Set in the very near future, COLONY centers on one family’s struggle to survive and bring liberty back to the people of an occupied Los Angeles.

TvShow.Title: CSI
TvShow.ShortDescription: CSI: CRIME SCENE INVESTIGATION is a fast-paced drama about a team of Las Vegas-based forensic investigators trained to solve crimes by examining the evidence. They are on the case 24/7, scouring the scene, collecting the irrefutable evidence and finding the missing pieces that will solve the mystery.

TvShow.Title: Donny!
TvShow.ShortDescription: Donny Deutsch plays a charmingly bombastic talk show host in USA’s new scripted comedy Donny!

TvShow.Title: First Impressions with Dana Carvey
TvShow.ShortDescription: A half-hour competition featuring Emmy Award-Winner & “SNL” Alum Dana Carvey and host Freddie Prinze Jr., pits America’s best amateur impressionists against each other in a battle of celebrity impression.

TvShow.Title: House
TvShow.ShortDescription: Dr. Gregory House (Hugh Laurie, “Stuart Little”) is devoid of bedside manner and wouldn't even talk to his patients if he could get away with it. Dealing with his own constant physical pain, he uses a cane that seems to punctuate his acerbic, brutally honest demeanor. While his behavior can border on antisocial, House is a maverick physician whose unconventional thinking and flawless instincts have afforded him a great deal of respect. An infectious disease specialist, he's a brilliant diagnostician who loves the challenges of the medical puzzles he must solve in order to save lives.

TvShow.Title: Movies On USA
TvShow.ShortDescription: Full movies are now available for streaming. Choose a title below and start watching now!

TvShow.Title: Motive
TvShow.ShortDescription: This unconventional crime drama poses the question of "whydunit" rather than "whodunit."

TvShow.Title: Law & Order: SVU
TvShow.ShortDescription: LAW & ORDER: SVU chronicles the life and crimes of the Special Victims Unit of the NYPD, an elite squad of detectives who investigate sexually based crimes.

TvShow.Title: Mr. Robot
TvShow.ShortDescription: MR. ROBOT is a psychological thriller that follows Elliot, a young programmer, who works as a cyber-security engineer by day and a vigilante hacker by night.

TvShow.Title: NCIS
TvShow.ShortDescription: Naval Criminal Investigative Service Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs leads a group of colorful personalities in investigating crimes -- ranging from murder and espionage to terrorism -- that have evidence connected to Navy and Marine Corps personnel.

TvShow.Title: NCIS: Los Angeles
TvShow.ShortDescription: NCIS is about Leroy Jethro Gibbs a former Marine Gunnery Sergeant, who is now a special agent for NCIS. He is an experienced criminal investigator and a highly skilled interrogator whose unorthodox approaches and willingness to bend the rules always gets the job done.

TvShow.Title: Playing House
TvShow.ShortDescription: Childhood best friends Maggie Caruso and Emma Crawford have shared countless adventures growing up together in the charming town of Pinebrook, CT. Now, Maggie and Emma are in store for one of their biggest adventures—raising a baby.

TvShow.Title: Queen of the South
TvShow.ShortDescription: The powerful story of Teresa Mendoza, a woman who is forced to run and seek refuge in America after her drug-dealing boyfriend is unexpectedly murdered in Mexico.

TvShow.Title: Queen of the South en Espanol
TvShow.ShortDescription: QUEEN OF THE SOUTH cuenta la potente historia de Teresa Mendoza, una mujer que se ve obligada a escapar y buscar refugio en Estados Unidos cuando su novio, un traficante de drogas, es asesinado de manera inesperada en México.

TvShow.Title: Royal Pains
TvShow.ShortDescription: The series follows Hank Lawson, a young emergency room doctor who, after being wrongly blamed for an important patient's death, moves to the Hamptons and becomes a reluctant "doctor for hire" to the rich and famous.

TvShow.Title: Satisfaction
TvShow.ShortDescription: A provocative drama that explores modern marriage at its midpoint. Through the lens of one couple, Neil Truman (Matt Passmore) and his wife, Grace (Stephanie Szostak), Satisfaction answers the question, “What do you do when having it all is not enough?” by delving into their shocking and unconventional choices.

TvShow.Title: Suits
TvShow.ShortDescription: One of Manhattan’s top corporate lawyers sets out to recruit a new hotshot associate and hires the only guy that impresses him – a brilliant but unmotivated college dropout.

TvShow.Title: White Collar
TvShow.ShortDescription: White Collar focuses on the unlikely partnership between charming con artist Neal Caffrey and straightforward FBI agent Peter Burke. Caffrey offers his expertise to help Burke and agents Clinton Jones and Diana Berrigan catch other elusive criminals in exchange for his freedom.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: After making a racially insensitive comment on his show, Donny tries to right the wrong by creating his own race initiative…to disastrous results.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Michael takes on a sympathy case for a Haitian man whose daughter was murdered by a corrupt government official who he believes is hiding in Miami.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: After the Resistance kidnaps a high-value hostage, the Los Angeles bloc is placed on lockdown.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 14
TvSeason.ShortDescription: The CSIs investigate a present-day crime with ties to a mob heist that occurred 25 years ago. Meanwhile, Brass has a decision to make when his daughter attempts suicide.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, the fast-paced drama series about a team of passionate forensic investigators trained to solve crimes the old-fashioned way--by examining the evidence.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 3
TvSeason.ShortDescription: House treats a boy who claims there is a tracking device in his neck and believes he's the subject of alien experimentation. Cameron is outraged when she learns Cuddy and Wilson have been lying.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: The husband of a former patient walks into House's office and shoots him. House continues to treat a patient from the ICU. As his patient's body deteriorates, House must trust his team to help.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2016
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Three guys, to support a friend devastated by a breakup, vow to stay single for as long as possible. The plan is derailed when they each fall in love and secretly work around their pledge.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: An elderly woman dies due to a robbery and sexual assault, but the detectives in the Special Victims Unit are surprised to learn that the rape was committed after the robbery – by someone else.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Tom Arnold is the guest of the week.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 4
TvSeason.ShortDescription: A gruesome murder with the same signature as one of Paula’s previous homicide cases could mean an innocent woman was convicted of a crime she didn’t commit.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 3
TvSeason.ShortDescription: In the season finale, Flynn, Vega and Lucas are determined to prove that Neville Montgomery is behind the murder of Maria Snow.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: elliot friends ray, hopes he can help finally delete mr. robot. dom makes a big discovery. darlene wonders whos the bigger threat-- fbi or dark army?

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 4
TvSeason.ShortDescription: While Todd works on a special song for Julie's birthday, he tricks her into planning her own surprise party. But when Julie threatens to cancel Todd's is forced to ask Savannah for help.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 3
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Todd drops Savannah off at college in Nashville, but in typical Todd fashion, finds a way to keep tabs on her. Meanwhile, Chase has his own scheme to capitalize on Savannah's new home.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: The Chrisley Family celebrates the holiday season gathered around the tree taking a look at some never-before-seen footage from Season Two.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Todd bets Julie that he can throw just as fabulous of a birthday party for Chloe as she could. Julie agrees to the bet, but tells Todd that he has to do it all on his own.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Camila esta desesperada, llena de deudas y con poco suministro. Entonces considera en entregar Teresa a la mafia. Mientras tanto, el negocio de drogas de Brenda se interfiere en la relacion entre su hijo, Tony, y ella.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: NCIS will pay the ultimate price when a hunt for a terrorist assassination team turns deadly for one NCIS team member.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Investigating a Secret Service agent's death aboard Air Force One leads Gibbs and the others to uncover a terrorist's scheme.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Callen races against an adversary to locate a woman who knows the whereabouts of a forgotten fortune earmarked to fund a new war in the Middle East - and also holds the key to his unknown past.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Camila, riddled with debt and short on supply, grows desperate and ponders giving Teresa up. Meanwhile, Brenda's burgeoning drug enterprise creates a rift between her and Tony.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Maggie surprises Emma with tickets to a very special concert. And an ol' friend rises from the ashes.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Maggie and Emma's preparations for the baby's christening are interrupted when Mark gets into trouble.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 8
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Boris prepares to leave the Hamptons and asks Hank to join him. Hank treats Libby, who is ignoring alarming symptoms. Evan & Paige dramatically grow their family. Divya gets long-awaited news.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 3
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Neal gets a taste of what his ideal life in New York might be like when he is assigned to work a case with his ex-girlfriend, Sara Ellis.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 2
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace get their new business off the ground while Adriana plots to keep Neil in her life for good.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 1
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace deal with the fallout from their secrets and Adriana is startled by a new arrival.

TvSeason.Title: SEASON 6
TvSeason.ShortDescription: Mike tries to stay safe without violating Danbury’s unwritten rules. Jessica and Harvey try to land a whale. Louis searches for an office tenant. And Rachel goes up against a fellow student.

TvEpisode.Title: Boom Boom Abs!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After making a racially insensitive comment on his show, Donny tries to right the wrong by creating his own race initiative…to disastrous results.

TvEpisode.Title: Sexual Secrets of Married Men: Exposed!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Donny exposes the Sexual Secrets of Married Men during sweeps week, the positive buzz he generates by preaching oversharing comes at a cost: his advice is breaking up couples everywhere.

TvEpisode.Title: I'm Middle Aged, Married, And...Coming Out!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Donny says something on his show that is misconstrued by the media for coming out, he finds himself swimming in positive attention and "Gay Perks."

TvEpisode.Title: Little League Dads Gone Wild!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Donny waxes poetic about the evils of pushy Little League Dads only to find himself struggling to find the right way to support his son Jagger in a tap competition.

TvEpisode.Title: Foxy At Fifty!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Inspired by a Donny! episode about sexy older women, Donny seeks romance with a woman his own age. He lands his fantasy woman who challenges him by taking the reigns in the relationship.

TvEpisode.Title: A Sext Ruined My Life!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Donny preaches No More Sexting on his show, only to get caught in his own sexting scandal after a “Suggestive Pic” he sends goes viral.

TvEpisode.Title: Truth and Reconciliation
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Michael takes on a sympathy case for a Haitian man whose daughter was murdered by a corrupt government official who he believes is hiding in Miami.

TvEpisode.Title: Seek and Destroy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Michael poses as a Corporate security specialist to help a wealthy art dealer track down a hacker in the company.

TvEpisode.Title: Hot Spot
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Michael, Fiona and Sam pose as a gang of ruthless car thieves to stop a thug who is threatening a local high school football star.

TvEpisode.Title: Gateway
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After the Resistance kidnaps a high-value hostage, the Los Angeles bloc is placed on lockdown.

TvEpisode.Title: Zero Day
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: ill plans to get his family out from under the occupation. Katie and Broussard prepare for a high-stakes operation. Snyder fights to protect his office. Maddie makes a bold political move.

TvEpisode.Title: In From The Cold
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A high-ranking Resistance member comes to the occupation, ready to cut a deal. Katie is given a second chance. Bram proposes a risky journey outside the colony walls.

TvEpisode.Title: Broussard
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Will's hunt for the Resistance brings him even closer to discovering his wife's secret. Katie feels cut off from her family and her cell. Maddie finds herself entangled in Green Zone intrigue.

TvEpisode.Title: Yoknapatawpha
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A Resistance operation traps Will, Katie, and Proxy Snyder in the Yonk and tests their allegiances.

TvEpisode.Title: Dead in His Tracks
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs investigate a present-day crime with ties to a mob heist that occurred 25 years ago. Meanwhile, Brass has a decision to make when his daughter attempts suicide.

TvEpisode.Title: Kitty
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs investigate the cyber-related murder of a prominent casino owner’s wife and receive help from the FBI’s Cyber Crime Division.

TvEpisode.Title: Consumed
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs track a cannibalistic killer and discover he’s not alone.

TvEpisode.Title: The Fallen
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Russell is taken hostage after a teenager opens fire in a police station.

TvEpisode.Title: Uninvited
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs are called to investigate when an entire family is reported to have been missing for a month.

TvEpisode.Title: Long Road Home
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs investigate the murder of a rock and roll groupie and the disappearance of a prostitute that both have ties to a mysterious band.

TvEpisode.Title: Killer Moves
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs investigate the murders of an Elvis impersonator and a bird that are strangely connected.

TvEpisode.Title: Love For Sale
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Nick and Greg investigate the death of a 16-year-old girl with ties to a brothel.

TvEpisode.Title: De Los Muertos
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The team works two separate cases, one involving a woman murdered in Mexico and the other a local couple found dead in their driveway, and finds that the evidence in one case may help the other.

TvEpisode.Title: Boston Brakes
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSIs are called to investigate a car crash and are shocked to discover the victim is someone they know.

TvEpisode.Title: Keep Calm and Carry On
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A petty crime aboard an inbound plane to Vegas becomes a murder investigation when one of the passengers is found dead.

TvEpisode.Title: The Lost Reindeer
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When a man is found murdered at an elaborate holiday party complete with real snow and live reindeer, the CSI team is brought in to investigate.

TvEpisode.Title: Girls Gone Wild
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A spa weekend for Sara, Finlay and Morgan turns into a murder investigation and missing persons case when Finlay disappears, as the CSI team must piece together what happened to find her.

TvEpisode.Title: Check In and Check Out
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSI team is called in to investigate the stabbing of a couple found at a local motel that is reminiscent of two incidents that occurred in the same room.

TvEpisode.Title: Helpless
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When a man is found dead inside a human-sized hamster ball, the CSI team is brought in to investigate. Also, the team collaborates with a swing shift CSI on a case involving a serial rapist.

TvEpisode.Title: Under a Cloud
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSI team investigates a John Doe found during torrential rains in Vegas. Meanwhile, Greg Sanders is investigated and accused of framing a man for murder seven years ago.

TvEpisode.Title: Passed Pawns
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSI team investigates the death of a homeless man who had a huge winning streak at a small casino.

TvEpisode.Title: Frame By Frame
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Catherine Willows returns to help the CSIs solve a cold case that has haunted the team for 14 years, on the milestone 300th episode.

TvEpisode.Title: Last Supper
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When contestants on a reality cooking show accidentally eat human flesh during a competition, the CSI team is brought in to investigate.

TvEpisode.Title: Torch Song
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSI team investigates a fire at a music venue that leaves four people dead, including two band members.

TvEpisode.Title: Take the Money and Run
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The CSI team is called in to investigate a murder and robbery at a poker game that had more than a million dollars in chips on the table.

TvEpisode.Title: The Devil and D.B. Russell
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: D.B. Russell leads the CSI team on a hunt to find Morgan and Ellie Brass following their kidnapping by a ritualistic killer, on the 14th season premiere.

TvEpisode.Title: Pilot
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, the fast-paced drama series about a team of passionate forensic investigators trained to solve crimes the old-fashioned way--by examining the evidence.

TvEpisode.Title: Cane & Able
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: House treats a boy who claims there is a tracking device in his neck and believes he's the subject of alien experimentation. Cameron is outraged when she learns Cuddy and Wilson have been lying.

TvEpisode.Title: Meaning
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After recovering from his gunshot wounds, House works feverishly on two cases: a paralyzed man who drove his wheelchair into a pool and a woman who became paralyzed after a yoga session.

TvEpisode.Title: No Reason
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The husband of a former patient walks into House's office and shoots him. House continues to treat a patient from the ICU. As his patient's body deteriorates, House must trust his team to help.

TvEpisode.Title: Who's Your Daddy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A Hurricane Katrina victim suffering from hallucinations as a result of the tragedy is brought to House by his bandmate. Although House fears his friend is being scammed, he takes the case.

TvEpisode.Title: Forever
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After a young mother has a seizure while bathing her child and almost drowns him, House and the team must discover what is causing Kara's seizures and find a way to save her son's life.

TvEpisode.Title: That Awkward Moment
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Three guys, to support a friend devastated by a breakup, vow to stay single for as long as possible. The plan is derailed when they each fall in love and secretly work around their pledge.

TvEpisode.Title: The Bourne Supremacy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Flushed from his momentary refuge by an assassin, amnesiac and ex-CIA killer Jason Bourne finds himself piecing together his life as he thwarts an international incident.

TvEpisode.Title: The Bourne Identity
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Wounded to the brink of death and suffering from amnesia, Jason Bourne is rescued at sea by a fisherman. As he starts to reconstruct his life, he finds that many people he meets want him dead.

TvEpisode.Title: The Third Guy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: An elderly woman dies due to a robbery and sexual assault, but the detectives in the Special Victims Unit are surprised to learn that the rape was committed after the robbery – by someone else.

TvEpisode.Title: Entitled, Part 1
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Special Victims Unit teams up with detectives from the 47th precinct to investigate a murder that may have been committed by the spoiled daughter of a beloved, influential family.

TvEpisode.Title: Limitations
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Cragen is ordered to work on the five-year-old case of a serial rapist before the statute of limitations expires, but the investigation is hindered by one of the victims.

TvEpisode.Title: Disrobed
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A judge who fought for the rights of abused women is found shot in his car under sordid circumstances, and the detectives uncover a case of corruption that leads to the state parole board.

TvEpisode.Title: Russian Love Poem
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A millionaire is found strangled in his home, and the detectives discover he was involved with a group of beautiful Russian women that came to the U.S. to take advantage of wealthy Americans.

TvEpisode.Title: Tom Arnold
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Tom Arnold is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: Yvette Nicole Brown
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Yvette Nicole Brown is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: Kate Flannery
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Kate Flannery is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: Kevin Nealon
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Kevin Nealon is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: Jon Lovitz
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Jon Lovitz is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: Steve Carell
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Dana Carvey guides 3 of America’s best celebrity impressionists through a series of improv games, and one is crowned winner. Steve Carell is the guest of the week.

TvEpisode.Title: The Scorpion and The Frog
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A gruesome murder with the same signature as one of Paula’s previous homicide cases could mean an innocent woman was convicted of a crime she didn’t commit.

TvEpisode.Title: The Score
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Angie and Paula find their personal boundaries tested when investigating the murder of an ex-con. Meanwhile, Vega also addresses boundary issues of his own with both Dr. Rogers and Lucas.

TvEpisode.Title: Index Case
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Angie and the team race against time to snag a killer who is inadvertently spreading a deadly pathogen across the city.

TvEpisode.Title: The Dead Name
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Angie temporarily steps in as Staff Sergeant as she investigates the murder of a football player’s wife.

TvEpisode.Title: The Vanishing Policeman
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Angie and newly minted Staff Sergeant Vega must adjust on the fly to their changed working dynamic, while dealing with the added pressure of bringing a cop killer to justice.

TvEpisode.Title: A Problem Like Maria
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: In the season finale, Flynn, Vega and Lucas are determined to prove that Neville Montgomery is behind the murder of Maria Snow.

TvEpisode.Title: Frampton Comes Alive
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Angie and Vega realize their prime suspect in the murder of an insurance adjuster, the victim’s wife, may be a victim of foul play herself.

TvEpisode.Title: The Amateurs
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The detectives must find the common denominator in three separate homicides in order to catch a killer in the midst of a crime spree.

TvEpisode.Title: Purgatory
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A plastic surgeon is the focus of Angie's investigation, the prime suspect is owner/operator of a recently renamed strip club.

TvEpisode.Title: Best Enemies
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A sleazy photographer is the prime suspect in the murder of his assistant; each of the detectives are interviewed about Angie’s methods.

TvEpisode.Title: Reversal of Fortune
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: As Flynn, Vega and Lucas hunt for the killer of a free-spirited tarot card reader, Vega gets some unsettling news from the doctor.

TvEpisode.Title: Pilot Error
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: While investigating an airline pilot who may be using his career to his murderous advantage, Angie copes with an increasingly distant Vega.

TvEpisode.Title: Fallen
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The team questions the grey zone between law and justice as they investigate the murder of a street artist by his own protege.

TvEpisode.Title: eps2.2_init_1.asec
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: elliot friends ray, hopes he can help finally delete mr. robot. dom makes a big discovery. darlene wonders whos the bigger threat-- fbi or dark army?

TvEpisode.Title: eps2.1_k3rnel-pan1c.ksd
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: elliot vows to beat mr. robot but it aint easy, smh. angela sees behind the scenes at evil corp. sh*t hits fan with fsociety.

TvEpisode.Title: Hacking Robot 101
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Live from New York City, the cast and creator of the hit USA drama “Mr. Robot” break down the long-awaited Season Two premiere and answer fan questions. #HackingRobot

TvEpisode.Title: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt2.tc
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: angela happy at evil corp. tyrell MIA and joanna has a new bf? wtf? dom leads fbi investigation into five/nine. elliot demands answers from mr. robot.

TvEpisode.Title: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt1.tc
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: one month later and omfg, five/nine changed the world. elliot in seclusion. darlene takes the lead. fsociety delivers malicious payload. TANGO DOWN? tbc.

TvEpisode.Title: Todd Goes Country
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: While Todd works on a special song for Julie's birthday, he tricks her into planning her own surprise party. But when Julie threatens to cancel Todd's is forced to ask Savannah for help.

TvEpisode.Title: Goat Farm Yourself
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd sends Chase and Savannah to a goat farm to learn the value of hard work. But things go array when the siblings let their petty bickering get in the way.

TvEpisode.Title: Family Matters
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Todd takes the juice bar employees on a team-building excursion Savannah and Chase get into a disagreement. And when Faye has a health scare, the Chrisley’s are forced to come together.

TvEpisode.Title: Chase In Charge
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd and Julie head to LA for Julie’s liposuction procedure leaving Chase in charge. But when Chase abuses his newfound authority, Todd must return home early to put a stop to Chases’ antics.

TvEpisode.Title: Smoothie Operator
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The family prepares for the Grand Opening of their newly purchased juice bar, but Chase can't take the job seriously. Back at the house, Faye tries to collect on a bet she made with Grayson.

TvEpisode.Title: Too Close For Comfort
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: As the Chrisleys settle into their new Nashville home, Todd begins to encroach upon Savannah's independence. Meanwhile, Grayson takes up wrestling and challenges Chase to a match

TvEpisode.Title: Moving On
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: In an effort to cheer up Grayson, Savannah organizes a farewell weekend for Grayson and friends. Meanwhile, Chase teams up with BFF Parker for an unexpected get-rich-quick scheme.

TvEpisode.Title: Runaway Faye
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd discovers that Faye has injured her foot on yet another gambling adventure and insists she recover at his house. Meanwhile, Julie pushes a reluctant Grayson to take piano lessons.

TvEpisode.Title: Lights, Camera, Chase
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Chase scores an internship at a local television station, he is forced to deal with some difficult talent, Todd Chrisley. And, looking for a new hobby, Faye and Julie learn Italian.

TvEpisode.Title: Todd Unleashed
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Savannah returns home for Jackson’s third birthday, she brings her new puppy with her, infuriating Todd. Chase attempts to bond with his dad for his own financial gain.

TvEpisode.Title: The Wrath of Todd
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Chase asserts his independence by getting a tattoo of a Bible verse, Todd tries everything in his power to entice Chase to remove it. Meanwhile, Savannah is failing her college Bible class.

TvEpisode.Title: Crowning Achievements
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Disappointed that he missed Savannah being crowned Miss Tennessee Teen USA, Todd plans a party to celebrate. Tension builds when it becomes clear the party is more for Todd than Savannah

TvEpisode.Title: Leaving The Nest
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd drops Savannah off at college in Nashville, but in typical Todd fashion, finds a way to keep tabs on her. Meanwhile, Chase has his own scheme to capitalize on Savannah's new home.

TvEpisode.Title: A Very Chrisley Christmas 2
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisley family reminisces over their favorite moments from the season, reliving their comical interactions and mishaps through a compilation of prior and never-before-seen clips.

TvEpisode.Title: The Graduates
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Savannah and Chase plan a weekend on their own to tour a college in Nashville, but their plans are soon foiled by Todd and Julie.

TvEpisode.Title: Hometown Hero
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd decides the kids are in need of a family history lesson. But when Todd reunites with some of his childhood friends, the lesson turns out to be more than he bargained for.

TvEpisode.Title: Sports Day
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisleys attend a family friend's annual Sports Day BBQ. Determined to break their losing streak, Todd's competitive spirit pushes his family to their breaking points.

TvEpisode.Title: Love and Marriage
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Todd and Julie prepare to make a "day in the life" anniversary video, the cracks in their marriage begin to show, and they scramble to reinvent themselves as the "perfect" couple.

TvEpisode.Title: Lord Chrisley
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd takes his family to the English countryside and insists on turning the Chrisleys into a proper English family. But when the family resists, Todd goes to great lengths to prove he's a royal.

TvEpisode.Title: Chrisleys Take London
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Chase and Savannah are ecstatic to embark on a family graduation trip to London, much to the chagrin of Todd, a creature of habit who's never left the country.

TvEpisode.Title: Dude Ranch
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Grayson decides he wants to be a real city slicker for his birthday present, and persuades his family to come to the ranch with him where they will see how country they really are.

TvEpisode.Title: Midlife Chrisley
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: With Todd's birthday fast approaching, he begins to obsess about his age and reject getting older, but with the help of Mama Faye and her friends, he begins to accept the future.

TvEpisode.Title: Failure To Launch
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Julie is excited to start her new food blog but when no one "likes" her page, she and Todd go on a food journey, which takes them from fine French cuisine to foraging for their own food.

TvEpisode.Title: Rules of Engagement
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Todd learns that Savannah has a new boyfriend, Todd goes to extreme lengths to try to get a glimpse of this new guy, and doesn't like what he sees.

TvEpisode.Title: College Bootcamp
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Chase pays a stranger to change his flat tire, Todd and Julie realize that they have sheltered their kids and decide to put them through a rigorous real-life boot camp.

TvEpisode.Title: Nurse Todd
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd is hurt when he offers to help all his kids but no one needs it, until Savannah is hit with appendicitis and becomes reliant on Todd and Julie; Todd's dream come true.

TvEpisode.Title: Chrisleys On Campus
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Savannah and Chase plan a weekend on their own to tour a college in Nashville, but their plans are soon foiled by Todd and Julie.

TvEpisode.Title: Dollars And Sense
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Savannah has a rose-colored view of what her spending habits will look like when she goes off to college, so Todd puts her on a realistic budget to help prepare her for the real world.

TvEpisode.Title: My Chrisley Valentine
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Todd learns that Chase is dating several different girls on Valentine's Day, he recruits Savannah to help teach his son a lesson about respecting women.

TvEpisode.Title: Getting Testy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Savannah makes a proposal to Todd, one that would allow her to go to college a year early, he wages an all-out family competition to keep her at home as long as possible.

TvEpisode.Title: Life's A Pitch
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd tries to save the day when he steps in to coach Grayson's baseball team, but when he finds out he's in way over his head, he must figure out how to regain the respect of 9-year olds.

TvEpisode.Title: Savannah's Big ID-ea
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When an influential Southern magazine asks The Chrisleys for an interview about all things fashion, Todd insists on controlling the situation by writing a script for his family to memorize.

TvEpisode.Title: A Very Chrisley Christmas
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisley Family celebrates the holiday season gathered around the tree taking a look at some never-before-seen footage from Season Two.

TvEpisode.Title: Still Chrisley After All These Years
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Julie and Todd decide to celebrate their wedding anniversary by throwing a charity event to raise money for breast cancer.

TvEpisode.Title: The Houseguest From Hell
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd Chrisley loves being the king of his castle, but his home life is turned upside down when Julie’s pregnant and very demanding, friend comes over to stay a few days.

TvEpisode.Title: Marriage Redux
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship.

TvEpisode.Title: The Great Outdoors
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd and Chase are forced to experience the great outdoors when Grayson insists on going camping.

TvEpisode.Title: Workin' For A Livin'
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After Todd unknowingly foots the bill for an extravagant lunch, he wants Chase and Savannah to learn that money doesn't grow on trees.

TvEpisode.Title: California Chrisleys
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisley's head to LA for their regular Beverly Hills haircuts - and for what Todd hopes will be a relaxing family vacation. But his plans are threatened by new levels of Chrisley craziness.

TvEpisode.Title: Anger Management
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd blames his family for his stress when his doctor tells him that he has high blood pressure. When Savannah gives Todd more bad news, things only get worse.

TvEpisode.Title: Chase Turns 18
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After 18 years of counting down the days, Chase is finally 18! When he tells Todd that he will no longer follow the house rules, Todd decides it’s time to give his son a dose of reality.

TvEpisode.Title: Confessions Of A Beauty Queen
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: With Savannah and Chase leaving in the next few years, Todd and Julie decide to downsize. When the move begins, Todd’s controlling ways increase, driving the family to a new level of crazy.

TvEpisode.Title: Father's Day
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: It’s Father's Day and the Chrisley kids plan a perfect day for Todd, but their bright idea of going to an amusement park soon backfires as their day of fun turns into an all-out competition.

TvEpisode.Title: Misadventures In Babysitting
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd and Julie leave their teenage children, Chase and Savannah, at home to watch 8-year-old Grayson overnight for the first time.

TvEpisode.Title: Rules For Dating My Teenage Daughter
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When Julie decides to goes back to work, Todd must transform into "Mr. Mom" and take over some of the household duties. Also, Savannah pleads her case to go out with a heartthrob musician.

TvEpisode.Title: Hey Chloe, It's Your Birthday!
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd bets Julie that he can throw just as fabulous of a birthday party for Chloe as she could. Julie agrees to the bet, but tells Todd that he has to do it all on his own.

TvEpisode.Title: Date Night
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisley kids show their love for their parents by treating them to a special day of pampering and a romantic dinner. What starts off with good intentions ends up in a comedy of errors.

TvEpisode.Title: Big Apple Blowup
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Todd takes Savannah and Chase to New York City to teach them more about the fashion business. Savannah is a perfect student, but Chase is only interested in the models and the nightlife.

TvEpisode.Title: Todd-Tervention
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisley's are off to their lake house to celebrate Todd's mother, Faye's, birthday. To his kids' dismay, Todd confiscates all electronic devices to ensure a weekend of real family bonding.

TvEpisode.Title: Two Men and a Baby
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The Chrisleys welcome Kyle’s daughter, Baby Chloe, who is coming to live with Todd and Julie while they teach Kyle "Parenting 101." Meanwhile, Savannah and Chase get into a fender bender.

TvEpisode.Title: Jugs and Ammo
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: While Lindsie recovers from plastic surgery, Todd and Lindsie's husband, Will, make an effort to find some common ground at the most unexpected place - a shooting range.

TvEpisode.Title: Not So Sweet Sixteen
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Savannah is turning sweet 16, and a big birthday bash is in the works. Todd has to come to grips with the fact that his little girl is growing into a young woman.

TvEpisode.Title: Patriarch of Perfection
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Meet the Chrisley family, where Todd Chrisley is king. He micromanages his family just like his business and always tries to stay five steps ahead of his 5 children.

TvEpisode.Title: El Engano Como La Regla
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Camila esta desesperada, llena de deudas y con poco suministro. Entonces considera en entregar Teresa a la mafia. Mientras tanto, el negocio de drogas de Brenda se interfiere en la relacion entre su hijo, Tony, y ella.

TvEpisode.Title: Un Alma. Un Mapa. Dos Futuros.
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Teresa presencia un horrible acontecimiento que apresura sus planes. Ahora que Brenda esta a salvo en Dallas, necesita dinero para sobrevivir y empieza a ligar con una pandilla que la ayudan a vender drogas.

TvEpisode.Title: Lirio de los Valles
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Un descuido mortal afecta la primera entrega de drogas que Teresa hace sola. De ahi se encuentra secuestrada por Batman que es el sicario de Epifanio.

TvEpisode.Title: Estrategia de Entrada
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Camila manda a Teresa a una expedicion de drogas para probar su lealtad. Camila comienza con su primer paso para derrotar el cartel de Epifanio. Mientras tanto, Brenda se escapa de Mexico para irse a Los Estados Unidos.

TvEpisode.Title: Cuarenta Minutos
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Teresa trabaja bajo al mando de Camila y demuestra que ella vale la pena. Mientras tanto, Epifanio esta a punto de atrapar a Teresa.

TvEpisode.Title: Twilight
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: NCIS will pay the ultimate price when a hunt for a terrorist assassination team turns deadly for one NCIS team member.

TvEpisode.Title: SWAK
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When a letter sealed with a kiss is delivered to NCIS, Tony assumes it's for him and opens it, only to release a mysterious powder into the NCIS squad room.

TvEpisode.Title: Hometown Hero
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs and the team work to clear the name of a Navy medic killed in Iraq, who is the prime suspect in a murder in his hometown.

TvEpisode.Title: Red Cell
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs and the team head back to school when a Marine in an ROTC program is found murdered on a college campus.

TvEpisode.Title: Conspiracy Theory
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates when a Petty Officer commits suicide after being institutionalized for a nervous breakdown.

TvEpisode.Title: Bikini Wax
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates when a petty officer who recently returned from duty is found dead backstage at a local bikini contest.

TvEpisode.Title: An Eye for An Eye
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates when a pair of blue eyeballs are sent to a sailor in D.C. in a package from Paraguay.

TvEpisode.Title: Pop Life
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates the bizarre death of a female petty officer who is found brutally murdered in the bed of a dance club bartender.

TvEpisode.Title: Caught On Tape
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates when a Marine records his own murder on video as he falls off a cliff.

TvEpisode.Title: Witness
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs gives McGee a shot at running a case when the NCIS team is called to investigate when a woman claims to have witnessed the murder of a sailor.

TvEpisode.Title: The Meat Puzzle
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: As he reassembles the pieces of three bodies found stuffed in barrels months ago, Ducky is shocked when he discovers their identities.

TvEpisode.Title: Doppelganger
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates the possible murder of a petty officer that was reported by a telemarketer, who heard it over the phone.

TvEpisode.Title: Black Water
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team investigates when the body of a naval officer missing for 2 years turns up at the bottom of a lake.

TvEpisode.Title: Chained
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The team must work together to find Tony when he disappears during an undercover operation.

TvEpisode.Title: Forced Entry
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs and his team are called to the scene when a Marine's wife shoots an intruder who tried to rape her.

TvEpisode.Title: Heart Break
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs and his team are summoned to examine the mysterious death of a Navy commander who, after successful open heart surgery, seemingly bursts into flames.

TvEpisode.Title: Call Of Silence
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Gibbs and his team must clear the name of an elderly Marine who confesses to murdering his best friend nearly 60 years ago.

TvEpisode.Title: Terminal Leave
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team protects an Iraqi War veteran who is the target of terrorist threats.

TvEpisode.Title: The Bone Yard
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A body found on a Marine firing range leads the team to discover a Mafia dumping ground.

TvEpisode.Title: Lt. Jane Doe
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team is called in to investigate when a body dressed as a Navy lieutenant is discovered apparently raped and murdered.

TvEpisode.Title: Vanished
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team is called in to investigate when a perfectly functioning Marine helicopter is found in the middle of a crop circle.

TvEpisode.Title: The Good Wives Club
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team is called in to investigate when the decomposed body of a woman in a wedding dress is found in a cell beneath abandoned military housing.

TvEpisode.Title: See No Evil
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When the wife and 9-year-old blind daughter of a Navy captain are kidnapped, Gibbs and his team are faced with a unique challenge.

TvEpisode.Title: Yankee White
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Investigating a Secret Service agent's death aboard Air Force One leads Gibbs and the others to uncover a terrorist's scheme.

TvEpisode.Title: Callen, G
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Callen races against an adversary to locate a woman who knows the whereabouts of a forgotten fortune earmarked to fund a new war in the Middle East - and also holds the key to his unknown past.

TvEpisode.Title: Burned
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After Callen's cover is blown and compromises the unit, the NCIS team races to find out who is behind the security breach.

TvEpisode.Title: Hunted
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team is on the hunt for a terrorist who escaped Army custody during a secretive transfer in Los Angeles.

TvEpisode.Title: Found
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team races to save one of their own when they receive video evidence of Special Agent Dominic Vail being held hostage months after he was kidnapped.

TvEpisode.Title: Fame
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: NCIS investigates the murder of a Navy officer entangled in the world of Hollywood glitz and glamour as the team is joined at Hetty's request by LAPD liaison Marty Deeks.

TvEpisode.Title: Hand-To-Hand
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When an undercover operation has the NCIS team investigating a MMA gym and its fighters, Sam Hanna is tasked with donning gloves and entering the cage for a one-on-one fight.

TvEpisode.Title: Blood Brothers
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The investigation of a drive-by shooting has the NCIS team searching Los Angeles for the dead marine's younger brother who may be the next target and the one with the answers.

TvEpisode.Title: Full Throttle
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: After a sailor is killed during a street race, the team determines that his car had been sabotaged and contained confidential equipment. Meanwhile, Callen is forced to take traffic school.

TvEpisode.Title: Chinatown
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The death of a lieutenant commander appears to be suicide but the team finds evidence corresponding to murder. Operational Psychologist Nate Getz joins Special Agent Kensi Blye in the field.

TvEpisode.Title: The Bank Job
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: While opening a safety deposit box at a local bank, NCIS Special Agent Kensi Blye is shot after three armed assailants enter and hold everyone in the building hostage.

TvEpisode.Title: LD50
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A crime scene poses a national security risk when the LA team discovers the location was used to create a deadly toxin which is now missing.

TvEpisode.Title: Missing
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The team rushes to a crime scene after receiving an "agent needs assistance" page and learns that one of their own is in peril.

TvEpisode.Title: Past Lives
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The murder of a recently released convict forces Callen to go undercover solo as an old alias, while Sam and the LA team track him from a distance.

TvEpisode.Title: Breach
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The death of a Petty Officer leads the NCIS team to a teenager in Sam's life. Meanwhile, Hetty is concerned about the effect that the workload is having on the team.

TvEpisode.Title: Brimstone
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: As the courtyard is transformed for the holidays, the team races to solve the murder of a Marine by an exploding phone and to find his former unit before another explosion kills someone else.

TvEpisode.Title: Random On Purpose
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Forensic scientist Abby Sciuto joins the Los Angeles NCIS team when a murder case resembles the pattern for a serial killer she has been tracking.

TvEpisode.Title: Ambush
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: While Hetty is attending a Senate hearing in D.C., the investigation of a murdered Marine Lance Corporal leads the NCIS team to stolen anti-tank missiles and a dangerous militia group.

TvEpisode.Title: Pushback
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Following the murder of a Russian woman, the NCIS team uncovers evidence that answers who and why Callen was shot six months ago.

TvEpisode.Title: Keepin It Real
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team must find a motive when they discover the body of a marine who had been living a double life as a wealthy bachelor.

TvEpisode.Title: Killshot
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When a United States citizen of North Korean descent is murdered, the secrets to classified software are thought to be lost until NCIS uncovers a suspect from Director Vance's past.

TvEpisode.Title: Search And Destroy
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The NCIS team searches Los Angeles for the lead suspect of a murdered Iraqi businessman, a former Marine who had been hired by a private security firm to protect him.

TvEpisode.Title: Predator
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: The team is assigned to track down a missing unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) after it is compromised during a training exercise killing a marine before it disappears.

TvEpisode.Title: The Only Easy Day
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A case involving the murder of a drug dealer turns personal for Special Agent Sam Hanna when he discovers his former Navy Seal comrades are involved.

TvEpisode.Title: Identity
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Newly located in a Los Angeles mission, the NCIS Office of Special Projects (OSP) welcomes Callen back to the team and races to solve a kidnapping case.

TvEpisode.Title: El Engano Como La Regla
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Camila, riddled with debt and short on supply, grows desperate and ponders giving Teresa up. Meanwhile, Brenda's burgeoning drug enterprise creates a rift between her and Tony.

TvEpisode.Title: Un Alma. Un Mapa. Dos Futuros.
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Teresa witnesses a horrific event that forces her to advance her plans. Now, safely in Dallas, Brenda needs money to survive, and starts assembling a rag tag team to help her sell drugs.

TvEpisode.Title: Lirio de los Valles
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: A deadly mistake mars Teresa’s first solo drug run and she soon finds herself in peril. Meanwhile, Brenda and Tony make the risky escape to Dallas.

TvEpisode.Title: Estrategia de Entrada
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Camila sends Teresa out on a major drug operation to test her loyalty. In secret, Camila makes her first big move to take over Epifanio's cartel. Meanwhile, Brenda plots her escape to America.

TvEpisode.Title: Cuarenta Minutos
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Teresa has to prove her worth to Camila. Meanwhile, Epifanio gets closer in his hunt for Teresa. Back in Mexico, Brenda desperately tries to find Teresa and hide from the cartel.

TvEpisode.Title: Celebrate Me Scones
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie surprises Emma with tickets to a very special concert. And an ol' friend rises from the ashes.

TvEpisode.Title: Officer Of The Year
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma organizes the Pinebrook Policeman's Ball with the help of Maggie and Rabbi Dan. Mark doesn't have a date.

TvEpisode.Title: Kimmewah Kup
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie and Emma's girls' weekend at Lake Kimmewah is interrupted by an unexpected visitor. The girls battle their old nemeses, The Custerman Twins.

TvEpisode.Title: Employee Of The Month
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: An injured Mark moves in with Emma and Maggie. Maggie struggles with a career that might have been.

TvEpisode.Title: Knotty Pine
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie and Emma accompany Tina to a woodworking class taught by a sexy teacher. Mark and Tina are forced to face some uncomfortable truths.

TvEpisode.Title: Cashmere Burka
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie agrees to direct a play written by Gwen. Emma gets hot and heavy with a new flame.

TvEpisode.Title: Sleepless In Pinebrook
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma coaxes a reluctant Maggie into the world of online dating. Zach and Bruce attempt to babysit Charlotte.

TvEpisode.Title: Hello, Old Friend
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: An awkward run-in with Mark and Tina forces Maggie and Emma to go on a rescue mission deep inside enemy territory. Bruce and Mary-Pat prepare the Sauce of the Season.

TvEpisode.Title: Bugs In Your Eyes
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie and Emma's preparations for the baby's christening are interrupted when Mark gets into trouble.

TvEpisode.Title: Let's Have a Baby
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie and Emma fall head over heels for the charming OBGYN who is delivering Maggie's baby.

TvEpisode.Title: 37 Weeks
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma organizes a crew to help Maggie prepare the house for the baby and sparks fly when past secrets are revealed.

TvEpisode.Title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma and Maggie turn Mark's annual policemen's spaghetti dinner into a night that won't soon be forgotten.

TvEpisode.Title: Bosephus and the Catfish
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie is suspicious of her brother Zach's online girlfriend. Emma helps Bruce in an unexpected way.

TvEpisode.Title: Drumline
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie attends her high school drumline reunion where she reconnects with an old crush and Emma bonds with a band nerd.

TvEpisode.Title: Totes Kewl
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma goes on a date with Maggie's divorce lawyer and then discovers a surprising secret about her mom.

TvEpisode.Title: Unfinished Business
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Maggie and Mark investigate Bruce's sudden disappearance. Emma reunites with her estranged mother Gwen.

TvEpisode.Title: Bird Bones
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma and Maggie have brunch with Mark's wife Tina, aka Bird Bones. Mark investigates a garden gnome robbery.

TvEpisode.Title: Pilot
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Emma returns home for her best friend Maggie's baby shower.

TvEpisode.Title: Uninterrupted
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Boris prepares to leave the Hamptons and asks Hank to join him. Hank treats Libby, who is ignoring alarming symptoms. Evan & Paige dramatically grow their family. Divya gets long-awaited news.

TvEpisode.Title: The Good News Is...
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Hank helps a theater legend as she deals with confusion and memory loss at Eddie’s wedding. He also reconciles Eddie and Evan before the ceremony. Paige & Evan await pregnancy test results.

TvEpisode.Title: Home Sick
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Hank meets a woman who fears she has an inherited disease. Eddie makes a medical decision without consulting Hank. Jeremiah learns that Boris went to clinical trials without his input.

TvEpisode.Title: Saab Story
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Hank treats an overworked Keller. Divya meets Hank’s mentor but a medical issue has changed him. Evan & Paige struggle with the demands of IVF. Jeremiah creates a video for Divya’s baby shower.

TvEpisode.Title: Doubt of Africa
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Hank works his first shift at the ER in years but has trouble with Evan’s orders in a quarantine situation involving Jill. Jeremiah bonds with his patient, an author. Divya worries about Lena.

TvEpisode.Title: Pulling Strings
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neal gets a taste of what his ideal life in New York might be like when he is assigned to work a case with his ex-girlfriend, Sara Ellis.

TvEpisode.Title: Upper West Side Story
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: When scholarship funds from a prestigious prep school mysteriously disappear, Neal poses as a substitute teacher to help Peter and the FBI figure out where the money is really going.

TvEpisode.Title: Checkmate
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neal is forced to come clean with Peter about the hidden cache in order to save Elizabeth.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through New Beginnings
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace get their new business off the ground while Adriana plots to keep Neil in her life for good.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Family
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil helps Simon unravel a family mystery while Adriana and Grace unite to outwit a threatening foe.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Psychedelics
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace extricate Anika from a dangerous situation after experiencing a mind-altering drug trip.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Travel
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace endeavor to win back Bastion’s lost investors while Adriana interferes in a family matter.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Negotiation
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace push the limits of their newfound connection while Adriana throws a kinky 1950s themed party.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Struggle
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Adriana's conflict spills out into Bastion, while Grace dips her toes back into the dating world.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Bondage
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Simon legitimize their partnership while Adriana introduces Grace to the world of BDSM.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Expansion
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Simon strike a tenuous business alliance while Adriana helps Grace expand her sexual boundaries.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Risk
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace dive further into the escorting business while Simon’s world is rocked when a ghost from his past shows up at his front door.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Release
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace confront their infidelities from the past six months while Adriana schemes to keep Neil and Grace apart for good.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Resolution
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace deal with the fallout from their secrets and Adriana is startled by a new arrival.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Revelation
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil and Grace are forced to address Anika's future as well as their own.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Security
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil contemplates how to handle an ominous warning and Grace discovers some upsetting information.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Terms and Conditions
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil struggles with a work deadline while Grace and Anika go on a college visit.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Exposure
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil is met with an unusual proposition while Adriana digs deeper into his home life.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Partnership
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil learns some unexpected information after a security breach at Bastion while Grace's design work produces some welcome exposure.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Self Discovery
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil tries to remake his public image to atone for a past mistake while pressures at work push Grace to make an impulsive decision.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Competition
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil brokers a deal with Simon while Grace enlists her sister's help to reconnect with her artistic side.

TvEpisode.Title: ...Through Admission
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Adriana tries to convince Neil to continue his secret life while Grace struggles to rejoin the working world.

TvEpisode.Title: Pilot
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Neil Truman discovers that his wife, Grace, is seeing a male escort and accidentally gains possession of the escort's phone. He gains a unique perspective on his life and what motivates women.

TvEpisode.Title: Back On The Map
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Mike tries to stay safe without violating Danbury’s unwritten rules. Jessica and Harvey try to land a whale. Louis searches for an office tenant. And Rachel goes up against a fellow student.

TvEpisode.Title: Accounts Payable
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Louis, Jessica and Harvey fend off a class action lawsuit from PSL's former clients. Meanwhile, Mike runs afoul of a fellow prisoner due to reasons beyond his own control.

TvEpisode.Title: To Trouble
TvEpisode.ShortDescription: Mike transitions to prison life while Harvey, Jessica, Louis, Donna and Rachel deal with the fallout of Mike’s plea deal and try to prevent what’s left of PSL from collapsing.
